languages.text: {n}Вздрогнув, как от удара плетью, Винтерскейл растерянно оглядывается — словно впервые осматривает центр деревни. Тени недоумения и тревоги омрачают его взгляд.{/n} "Что здесь произошло? Кто посмел?.." {n}Осознание произошедшего вырисовывается на его лице новыми морщинами.{/n} "Нет. Я же не мог? Или..."

traits.locale_text: {n}Вздрогнув, как от удара плетью, Винтерскейл растерянно оглядывается — словно впервые осматривает центр деревни. Тени недоумения и тревоги омрачают его взгляд.{/n} "Что здесь произошло? Кто посмел?.." {n}Осознание произошедшего вырисовывается наего лице новыми морщинами.{/n} "Нет. Я же не мог? Или..."

languages.text: {n}Flinching as if struck by a whip, Winterscale stares at the village with the look of someone who is seeing it for the first time. Confusion and unease creep into his gaze.{/n} "What happened here? Who dared?" {n}The realisation forms new lines on his face.{/n} "No. I surely couldn't have. Or..."
languages.original_text: {n}Вздрогнув, как от удара плетью, Винтерскейл растерянно оглядывается — словно впервые осматривает центр деревни. Тени недоумения и тревоги омрачают его взгляд.{/n} "Что здесь произошло? Кто посмел?.." {n}Осознание произошедшего вырисовывается на его лице новыми морщинами.{/n} "Нет. Я же не мог? Или..."

traits.locale_text: {n}Shuddering as if from a whip lash, Winterscale looks around in confusion — like it was his first time seeing the centre of the village. The shadows of anxiety and confusion darken his gaze.{/n} "What happened here? Who dared to do this?.." {n}The realization forms new wrinkles on his face.{/n} "No. I surely couldn't? Or..."

The shadows of anxiety and confusion darken his gaze.{/n} "What happened here? Who dared to do this?.." {n}The realization forms new wrinkles on his face.{/n} "No. I surely couldn't? Or..."

The shadows of anxiety and confusion darken his gaze.{/n} "What happened here? Who dared to do this?.." {n}The realization forms new wrinkles on his face.{/n} "No. I surely couldn't. Or..."

Who dared?" {n}The realisation forms new lines on his face.{/n} "No. I surely couldn't have. Or..."

Who dared?" {n}The realisation forms new lines on his face.{/n} "No. I surely couldn't have. Or..."

languages.text: {n}Winterscale recula como si hubiera recibido un latigazo y mira la aldea como si fuese la primera vez que ve su estado actual. Un velo de ansiedad y confusión ensombrece su semblante.{/n} «¿Qué ha pasado aquí? ¿Quién se ha atrevido a hacer esto?». {n}Se forman nuevas arrugas en su rostro cuando por fin comprende lo ocurrido.{/n} «No. No he podido ser yo. O...».
languages.original_text: {n}Flinching as if struck by a whip, Winterscale stares at the village with the look of someone who is seeing it for the first time. Confusion and unease creep into his gaze.{/n} "What happened here? Who dared?" {n}The realisation forms new lines on his face.{/n} "No. I surely couldn't have. Or..."

traits.locale_text: {n}Winterscale se estremece como si hubiese recibido un latigazo y mira en derredor, confundido, como si fuese la primera vez que contempla el estado de la aldea. Un velo de ansiedad y confusión ensombrece su semblante.{/n} «¿Qué ha pasado aquí? ¿Quién se ha atrevido a hacer esto?». {n}Se forman nuevas arrugas en su rostro cuando por fin comprende lo ocurrido.{/n} «No. No he podido ser yo...».

languages.text: {n}温特斯凯尔畏缩了一下，仿佛遭到鞭打一样。他环顾四周，仿佛第一次看清这座村子里发生了什么事情。他的目光中充满了焦虑与困惑。{/n}“这里发生了什么事情？是谁这么胆大包天？”{n}随后，他皱起了脸，仿佛意识到了什么事情。{/n}“不可能，这不可能是我干的，可……”
languages.original_text: {n}Flinching as if struck by a whip, Winterscale stares at the village with the look of someone who is seeing it for the first time. Confusion and unease creep into his gaze.{/n} "What happened here? Who dared?" {n}The realisation forms new lines on his face.{/n} "No. I surely couldn't have. Or..."

traits.locale_text: {n}突然之间，温特斯凯尔浑身发抖，就像挨了一鞭子一样。他困惑地环顾四周，仿佛第一次看清这座村子里发生了什么事情。他的目光黯淡下来，焦虑与困惑的阴影掠过他的双眼。{/n}“这里发生了什么事情？是谁这么胆大包天？竟敢……”{n}随后，他的脸皱了起来，仿佛意识到了什么事情。{/n}“不可能，这不可能是我干的。或者……”

languages.text: {n}Winterscale frémit comme sous l'effet d'un coup de fouet et regarde autour de lui d'un air confus, comme si c'était la première fois qu'il voyait le village. L'anxiété assombrit son visage.{/n} « Que s'est-il passé ici ? Qui a osé faire ça ? » {n}De nouvelles rides se forment sur son front à mesure qu'il prend conscience de la situation.{/n} « Non. Je n'aurais pas pu. À moins que... »
languages.original_text: {n}Flinching as if struck by a whip, Winterscale stares at the village with the look of someone who is seeing it for the first time. Confusion and unease creep into his gaze.{/n} "What happened here? Who dared?" {n}The realisation forms new lines on his face.{/n} "No. I surely couldn't have. Or..."

traits.locale_text: {n}Winterscale frémit comme sous l'effet d'un coup de fouet et regarde autour de lui d'un air confus, comme si c'était la première fois qu'il voyait le village. L'anxiété assombrit son visage.{/n} « Que s'est-il passé ici ? Qui a osé faire ça ? » {n}De nouvelles rides se forment sur son front à mesure qu'il prend conscience de la situation.{/n} « Non. Je n'aurais pas pu. À moins que... »

languages.text: {n}まるで鞭に打たれたかのように身震いしたウィンタースケールは、初めてそれを見たかのように村に目をやる。その視線には、不安と戸惑いが影を落とす。{/n}「ここで何が起こった？誰がこんなことをしたんだ？」{n}それを悟った彼の顔に、新たなシワが刻まれる。{/n}「違う。俺じゃない。さもなければ…」
languages.original_text: {n}Flinching as if struck by a whip, Winterscale stares at the village with the look of someone who is seeing it for the first time. Confusion and unease creep into his gaze.{/n} "What happened here? Who dared?" {n}The realisation forms new lines on his face.{/n} "No. I surely couldn't have. Or..."

traits.locale_text: {n}まるで鞭に打たれたかのように身震いしたウィンタースケールは、初めてそれを見たかのように村に目をやる。その視線には、不安と戸惑いが影を落とす。{/n}「ここで何が起こった？誰がこんなことをしたんだ？」{n}それを悟った彼の顔に、新たなシワが刻まれる。{/n}「違う。俺じゃない。さもなければ…」

languages.text: {n}Als hätte ihn ein Peitschenhieb getroffen, starrt Winterzunder auf das Dorf, als würde er es zum ersten Mal sehen. Verwirrung und Unbehagen schleichen sich in seinen Blick.{/n} "Was ist hier geschehen? Wer war das?" {n}Die Erkenntnis bildet neue Falten auf seinem Gesicht.{/n} "Nein. Das hätte ich niemals tun können. Oder ..."
languages.original_text: {n}Flinching as if struck by a whip, Winterscale stares at the village with the look of someone who is seeing it for the first time. Confusion and unease creep into his gaze.{/n} "What happened here? Who dared?" {n}The realisation forms new lines on his face.{/n} "No. I surely couldn't have. Or..."

traits.locale_text: {n}Winterzunder zuckt zusammen, als hätte er ein Schleudertrauma erlitten, und blickt sich verwirrt um, als würde er das Dorfzentrum zum ersten Mal sehen. Die Schatten der Unruhe und Verwirrung verdüstern seinen Blick.{/n} "Was ist hier geschehen? Wer hat das gewagt?" {n}Die Erkenntnis bildet neue Falten auf seinem Gesicht.{/n} "Nein. So etwas kann ich unmöglich tun. Oder ..."

languages.text: {n}Kamçıyla vuruşmuşçasına geriye sıçrayan Winterscale, âdeta ilk defa gören gözlerle kasabayı izliyor. Bakışlarına kafa karışıklığı ve huzursuzluk yayılıyor.{/n} "Burada ne oldu? Buna kim cüret etti?" {n}Hakikatin farkına varmasıyla birlikte yüzünde yeni çizgiler oluşuyor.{/n} "Hayır. Tabii ki ben böyle bir şey yapmam. Yoksa..."
languages.original_text: {n}Flinching as if struck by a whip, Winterscale stares at the village with the look of someone who is seeing it for the first time. Confusion and unease creep into his gaze.{/n} "What happened here? Who dared?" {n}The realisation forms new lines on his face.{/n} "No. I surely couldn't have. Or..."
